title: George W. Bush, White House's lost 22 million e-mails?
subtitle: Some 22 million official e-mails from the White House, most of which were sent and received through private non-governmental servers, were reported missing or lost during the administration of George W. Bush.
author: David Emery
vclaim: (G.W.) The Bush administration "lost" 22 million official e-mails sent and received through private servers between 2003 and 2005.
